website_summaries.verdict: The attractive vertical design allows this versatile masticating juicer to save space on your countertop.
pros: Low speed of 43 RPM is slower than other masticating juicers to preserve nutrients
Juice also lasts longer because temperature is kept down
Dual-edge auger can handle fruits vegetables, wheatgrass, and other leafy greens
cons: Smaller feed chute requires cutting ingredients into small pieces, which can increase prep time

customer_reviews.title: Top
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Making juice every day. You got to cut all the produce but its not a big thing. Excellent juice with not much pulp in it. Update 6 months later: I still really love to juice. Unfortunately it started to leak. I thought not a big thing and asked the customer service for help. Even got a confirmation of my request via email. But nothing but silence. 2 times now. So even if they praise their 15 year warranty. You better do not rely on this. It's a total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Wolly

customer_reviews.title: For the Love of Juicing
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing machine. Had to get my Mom and Brother one after they saw how easy it was to create juice you pay a fortune for in stores. And who knows what's being added in the process. The self cleaning is a plus. Win Win with a 15 year warranty !!! You can also close the hole so you can fill up to 16oz inside the base of the bowl. If you want to turn your health around into a light you've never felt. This is the juicer to give you that inspiration to enjoy juicing everyday.
customer_reviews.author: trevor boyer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down in 5 months/ no customer service
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for 5 months. It completely stopped working at the 5 month mark. A replacement or return was rejected. When trying to call customer service multiple times, I am placed on hold for 30 minutes and then promptly and immediately disconnected upon answer. So basically I paid $100 a month for celery juice. This is terrible business practice.
customer_reviews.author: Tina webb

customer_reviews.title: Your best choice.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this just a few days and it works beautifully. No problem cutting fruit and veggies, it helps in determining the quality of what you bought. The quietest compared to others I have owned over a 40 year period. Easy to clean. Someone has written that it is manufactured in China, incorrect this is made in Korea and of top quality, the fit and tolerances are excellent. The packaging is well engineered with 3 levels of boxes as shown. No manufacturer has a better warranty, think of it 15 years! I should live so long.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Tai

customer_reviews.title: Full of dried and moldy food
customer_reviews.text: Received it today / full of dried moldy food. Tried to contact manufacturer. Told because of Covid-19 to email the company. The emails were undeliverable. Typed exactly as directed. Mailbox does not exist. No way to phone. No way to email. May as well close your doors if you cannot provide service. I am thinking this was a previously returned item that wasn't properly cleaned and processed. Yuck. I washed it, nut still too grossed out to use it, Returning
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Recently took up juicing and did my research. This one wont let you down. You get a lot of juice and the pulp is pretty dry. Have to cut up your veggies fyi, small shoot for them to go down. Cleaning is pretty easy now that I have the hang of it. Celery will clog if you don't cut up in to small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Omega customer service not available w
customer_reviews.text: This is a good juicer but after less than one year it is already not working as well as it used to (and I am very careful chopping produce etc..) and now the auger has suddenly broken. Omega does not answer the phone. You have to leave an email and according to their automated message wait one week for a first response. I also don't know if they will replace the auger or not. Will update my review to let you know how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Juicer latching stop broke during normal juicing operation
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this juicer 3 years ago. It was very sparingly used. I started using it a month ago because of my wife's medical condition. The Latch Stop which hold the juicer to the body got ripped off / broke down. I expected this to last longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Rajesh Mendiratta

customer_reviews.title: Really worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Glad we invested in this Omega slow vertical juicer, it has been worth every penny to have a juicer that is such a breeze to clean. I like the small space it takes up on the counter. Drinking fresh vegetable juice every morning has improved my health immensely. Visit the Medical Medium website or get his books here and learn how you don't have to suffer with chronic illness and pain! As a side note Omega has a incredible 15 year warranty and super friendly customer service.
customer_reviews.author: 00_jackie_00

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean makes good juice I normally use apples, spinach pears cucumbers. I have to cut apples in 8ths or 6ths cucumber into 4ths basically the insert slot is small but other than that no issues yet had for several months. To wash I wash in the sink every 5 uses I'll out in the dishwasher. At first I was using everyday then it dropped down to about once a week no fault of the juicer it was just getting to expensive to buy the fruits and vegetables sad that the subsidies are such that healthy farmed items cost the most
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Very good little juicer
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this juicer. It does a good job on most of the fruit and vegetables that I juice. I would like it to do better with kale and carrots but I would certainly recommend this. It doesn't do very good with citrus fruits.
customer_reviews.author: Ms G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very quiet compared to using my Vitamix for juicing! Very efficient. Produces pure quality juice. I juice celery every day and so far, it has been a pleasure and I no longer dread the process of making my celery juice every day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this juicer.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this juicer. I have to double strain the juice every time I make juice just to get the pulp out. I have to cut carrots, celery, apples, fennel, etc into tiny sticks in order for it not to jam and even then it jams multiple times every time I make juice. The lid gets sealed to the top and I can't remove it without using a clamp and a wrench. I used to love juicing. I hate juicing with this juicer, it is more of a headache than it is worth. Do not buy this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Super great product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. This is working super well for me at the moment. I had one of there horizontal juicers which worked well also but this vertical option definitely speeds things up and is a more enjoyable experience. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because I think this product should include a straining scream to place over the juice bucket for those who do not prefer pulp. This is something they have on many of their other products that should be an option here also.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Curry

customer_reviews.title: once you get used to assembling it, its easy to use and very efficient
customer_reviews.text: I like that the juice is of better quality and it keeps longer. I love the sound of the auger crunching the carrots. You have to cut them small enough that the machine doesn't stall. but its easy to undo with the reverse switch. I am happy with this purchase. I have owned many juicers of all types, this is my favorite. but
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've had the juicer 9 mo now. Doesn't juice. After I'm done I have to strain before drinking. The strainer even gets clogged there is so much pulp left over. It also gets stuck often on veggies. I spent a lot on this one, very expensive compared to most. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krisha M.

customer_reviews.title: The Bowl leaked during Juicing and Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten a defective product because the bowl leaked onto the counter during juicing and cleaning. Too bad, I liked the size and look of the juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Stilson Tomita

customer_reviews.title: amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: amazing product, I bought different juicers but i wasn't satisfy with the final product and after serching reading reviews, I thought it was a little to expensive I decided to purchase this one, It was the best purchase i did. I'm not an expert about juicing etc, but i totally see a difference about the juice coming out of the omega, compare with other ones, and it's very easy to clean that is a plus for me. I truly love it! i totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Easy to Use, Quick to clean, But Not Great For Juicing Grasses
customer_reviews.text: We already own an Omega 8004 single auger horizontal juicer which is about the best affordable all-around juicer available. Our new VSJ843 is a close runner up except when juicing wheat or barley grasses. Also, it it much easier to feed vegetables into, and cleaning is easy and quick. If juicing grasses is important to you, the VSJ843 is not, in my opinion, your best choice (See healthhackers.org for info regarding grasses), but it does everything else (especially fruits) very well.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T. Scofield

customer_reviews.title: bulk of food gets stuck under masticator
customer_reviews.text: I have used this juicer maybe 10 times trying to iron out the issues... feeding produce through the machine in a different order, feeding them through extra slowly, not using certain produce to eliminate which produce causes the issue etc. the food gets stuck under the masticator producing much less juice than if it cycled all the way through to the waste bucket. I asked amazon to refund me for the machine. they said they would look into the issue with the manufacturer and call me back. that was at the beginning of covid and here we are still waiting to be refuded on a $450 machine that i stopped using 8 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many juicers and return them. This one is a keeper. Worth the money if you want an outstanding jucier. Easy to clean, pulp is DRY and flavor is good. INVEST in one!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome juicer
customer_reviews.text: I use the juicer for everything without problems beets carrots are what I use a lot of. It juices with no problems. carrots I just slice lengthwise. I do other hard veggies and soft ones as well as long as leafy greens. just after a hand full or two of soft stuff throw in a piece or two of celery or a carrot till you see flow out the waste end. I am very happy with this product and would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: William A Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up/ Quality juice and output
customer_reviews.text: Have had for a while now still works great...use a couple of times week..very happy with this juicer. Easy clean up is why I chose this one ..if not easy and quick then wouldnt use lol..so that is first reason for buying this one...second reason is juice output and quality of juice..
customer_reviews.author: darlarose

customer_reviews.title: Black center ring (rubber/silicone?) has torn -- is there a way to get a replacement part?
customer_reviews.text: The black center ring (silicone/rubber?) has torn, which causes juice to leak all over the machine and counter. Can I get a replacement for the rubber ring? Other than this, I have been happy with this juicer. I primarily use it to juice celery.
customer_reviews.author: ls418

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer for the price, very solid, reasonable to clean.  Pulp is usually very dry...makes great juice.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this works pretty well. Does take a bit of time to clean, but they all do. I've put it through its paces, and it's still going strong. However, I am concerned a tiny bit, as you can see the wear of the plastic inside..which means, it's only going on place..in you, lol. However, the same thing happens with a metal juicer...just par for the course...but its extremely minimal wear, just mild scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Catnip

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer for those who want the juice
customer_reviews.text: Great Juicer for those who want the juice, but not the pulp!! The need to "cut up" fruits and veggies is decreased but not eliminated with the large feeder tube. Operation is pretty quick and smooth, and I love the color. Overall, I love my Omega !!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy D

customer_reviews.title: no carrot juice?
customer_reviews.text: This juicer jams with even a very small piece of carrot. They sent me some parts--a new screen--which had nothing to do with the problem and still it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: sada khalsa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Love the horizontal juicer. It is easier to clean, easy to assemble and makes wonderful juice. Truly love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Winchester

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up, food must be prepared before juicing. I am able to Juice a wide variety of fruits and vegetables. Dry pulp and easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny!!! Bought this juicer in Sept 2017. Used every day for juicing . Quality of juice is much better that the other type of juicers. Cal also juice greens. Had some fault with the machine in Jan 2020. The customer service was great . They not only fixed the juicer but also sent me new hopper, auger, screen blade and plunger... This is awesome!!! You guys just earned a loyal Customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Adithya Prakash

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this juicer. No pulp in my juice. my other VRT 350 had tons of pulp, and foam in the juice and I didn't like that. Not much foam in juice. Clean up is a lot easier with the self clean. The only small con is this one doesn't self feed as well as the vrt 350, but it feeds better than the 8006.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Pitzer

customer_reviews.title: It juices
customer_reviews.text: Juicing. Image is a mango/strawberry martini made. You can do a lot with a good juicer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jelinek

customer_reviews.title: USPS said it was tuck in Georgia
customer_reviews.text: ThisOmega juicer was highly recommended and I was excited to receive it because I live in a rural area where organic vegetables are plentiful. However it NEVER ARRIVED thanks to the US Postal Service FIASCO in July/August 2020!!!
customer_reviews.author: M J

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as my juicing progressed. It is a great product, quiet and works really well. The parts are really easy to clean. The only item it seems to have trouble with is carrots, but that is fine if you just hit reverse and continue on. Whenever people come over and I am juicing, they ask if I am a salesman for Omega, because I can't say enough good about it.
customer_reviews.author: themetzman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: The Omega VSJ843QS is a phenomenal machine. I primarily juice ginger, which actually has broken multiple centrifugal juicers in the past. The Omega juices ginger with ease! Much higher juice yield as well. It's expensive but it's a good value due to the excellent quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch H.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Wife has been wanting one for a long time so after doing some research we settled on this model and after using it a lot for the past 45 days we are glad we got this model....easy to use and clean up....fits on top of the counter in the space under the cabinet and it being the more upright style doesn't take up as much room.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY, HAPPY, HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: I did my homework and I am so happy with this juicer! Now I really know what juice should look and taste like. I'm getting a full 8oz of beautiful (no separation) juice, and very dry pulp, where with my old (considered quality) juicer I was getting 1/4 cup with very wet pulp that was impossible to re-process. My old Breville is getting tossed. I wouldn't give it away. And this Omega is quick and easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Siciliano

customer_reviews.title: NOT VDRY X
customer_reviews.text: Submit Your recently viewed items and featured recommendations Recommendations & Popular Items Page 1 of 3 Page 1 of 3 This shopping feature will continue to load items. In order to navigate out of this carousel please use your heading shortcut key to navigate to the next or previous heading. Back
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: i love the product
customer_reviews.text: A quality product and everything in the brochure is really true. Extracts all types of detail in an exhaustive and high quality, easy to clean and this is a very important thing in a juice extractor machine
customer_reviews.author: danny mizrachi

customer_reviews.title: Im know sure the quality of omega jucier. But ...
customer_reviews.text: Im know sure the quality of omega jucier. But im ver sure the vendor sent me the defect machine. It’s cant function and has splits on the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Idy C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, easy, easy
customer_reviews.text: Extracts juice well, runs quietly, easy to clean and easy to reassemble. A quality product
customer_reviews.author: Five-star Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Quality juice but not easy to detach the lid
customer_reviews.text: Maximum juice output and it produces quality juice. The machine is very quiet. Unfortunately, the lid gets stuck on for long time and it happens quite often. I learned from friend that horizontal slow juicer is much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robo

customer_reviews.title: Commercial grade construction, built to last.
customer_reviews.text: This Omega Vert Juicer is amazing! Easy to assemble, operate and clean. My wife and I did extensive research before we decided upon this unit. We wanted to be absolutely sure that we were getting the best bang for our buck. It is, hands down, one of the best investments we made toward our health.
customer_reviews.author: victor starkes

customer_reviews.title: The bomb dot com!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 10 stars would!!! Am a mom of 3 and I never write reviews, but had to on this. I did tons of research before I made this purchase and this product did not disappoint. You will love it this juicer. Discount juicers put out a video by John Kohler that lays out all great aspects of juicer, definitely worth looking at to decide and once you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LeGrand E. Pound

customer_reviews.title: Love my juicer
customer_reviews.text: Had for several months...key to remember, fibrous foods such as pineapple and beets, cut in small pieces, space them apart, use carrots to move solids through. Otherwise very happy with unit!
customer_reviews.author: Arne Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Surprised with first run
customer_reviews.text: After cleaning out of box, gave it a test run. Good amount of juice from produce as compared to juicers I had in the past. One thing me and the wife noticed was the dryness of the pulp. Looking at videos and reviews did this juicer no justice. Still new, will review after really getting to know it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Mord juice and less cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer: for over a year it performed beautifully and juiced anything we fed it! The best of all, cleanup is a snap, especially if done before pulp dries out! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tea lover

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent juicer. Had a centrifugal previously and this is so much better. Great taste!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnica Henry

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad juicer but DEFINITELY not worth the price. I am not happy with the quality, and mechanism. I am not encouraged to use it, for one its not east to clean, I have to juice small batches at a time,,too much to say,,,
customer_reviews.author: xx

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and assemble
customer_reviews.text: Make my green vegetables drink Very easy to use love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean. Looks great in kitchen. Work well. Too expensive! (15year warrenty)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So glad I went with this slow juicer. Works great, taste great! A great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Assembles easily
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Assembles easily. Pretty easy to clean. Not anywhere as noisy as other juicers.definately would recommend. Easy to contact customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Muchfaith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I searched online for the best masticating juicer and this one by far is my favorite. It does a good job of squeezing out the juices from vegetables and fruits. It is also a snap cleaning and assembling the product.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE
customer_reviews.text: No brainer setup didn't need a manual but used it to double check as we previously bought the Kuvings juicer and that was a nightmare setup. It was easy to juice 6 14oz glasses in less then 30 mins and cleanup was just as easy to breakdown and wash. Price was a lot less then the previous but this was much more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: GENEVIEVE PHIPPS

customer_reviews.title: Bad out of the box!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when the unit arrived. I had saved some time to make this purchase. I spent over $400.00 on the unit. I literally went to produce my first batch and the unit would not power on......Heartbreaking.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Omega VERT
customer_reviews.text: Works great, tastes great! Produces much better juice than the centrifugal juicers. You don't have to force the food in like the horizontal auger juicers. I've used it daily for months now. It will sometimes get stuck on larger carrots so cut them in two or three pieces. I do wish it came with a strainer. Cleans VERY easily with the auto cleaning feature. You get what you pay for! 15 year warranty!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: not great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, not great for the price. Not easy to operate and it took huge effort to take off the cap after each use. Returned..
customer_reviews.author: DXL

customer_reviews.title: I love this juicer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine! It is quite powerful and produces delicious juice. Super easy to disassemble, clean and put back together. My only suggestion is to thoroughly clean the screen portion each time you juice, as the pulp can dry and plug up those very fine holes.
customer_reviews.author: Cr3psley

customer_reviews.title: would recommend to my friend
customer_reviews.text: The machine work as it should. would recommend to my friend
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best I have used so far. Easy yo use, Easy to Clean, Almost zero foam, or waste.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my wife and she did her research
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best unit on the market. It does take a bit to clean it, but very very well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. I am new to juicing and this Onega is so quiet and easy to operate. Cleanup is so easy that we are using it twice a day. I do recommend watching the videos online as they will provide useful tips such as alternating softer fruits and vegetables with harder plus tip of putting water in the Omega to clean it once finished.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Mom

customer_reviews.title: This juicer is fantastic! Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is fantastic! Well worth the money. Because of the slow speed, it delivers more phytonutrients in the juice. You can almost feel your body absorbing the phytonutrients. I am addicted to coffee, but juicing with this thing first thing in the morning is better than coffee. It really gets you going. I highly recommend it !!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean too
customer_reviews.text: It’s quiet, more juice and less pulps. It’s what I expected a juicer would be. Easy to clean too. Materials are well made.
customer_reviews.author: rrav4u

customer_reviews.title: Good over all.
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use and easy to clean. It has very good yield on fruits that's what I use it for. It also does not produce any noise. It's a good buy for me although it's a little expensive than it's competitors.
customer_reviews.author: P G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Juicer, has become a favorite in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and durable, highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Really high quality, works amazingly well. Slow speed so the juice stays fresh longer, a lot of torque and has a reverse mode if you get too aggressive with too hearty vegetables. Large carrots will stop it, but that is about it, the unit juices everything really well. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This Omega juicer is quiet, easy to clean and the pulp comes out dry. Priced great for the quality and quantity of juice we get, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sperling

customer_reviews.title: Definitely choose this one if you are new!
customer_reviews.text: First Juicer I have had and I love it! It makes the process so easy, it’s pretty on my counter and the cleanup is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: samantha lane

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer! It replaced my Old Champion And is some much easier to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Beemer

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a week or so but is working well, makes a lot of juice and is easy to clean. It does stall when you try to go too fast with the carrots (as others have said) but has no problem with cut up celery or beets. When it stalls the reverse button works well and this process doesn't seem to be hard on the unit. I like the slow RPM action, my wife was pleasantly surprised at how quietly it operates. Good looking unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sunday Shooter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loving it!!!! If you don't push the fruit and vegies through, you will not have any pulp.
customer_reviews.author: Keepingitholy

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this unit at this price to any of my friends.
customer_reviews.text: The machine functions well, but for the price I expected something a little higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, little pulp.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, well made juicer. Good for people that don’t like pulp in their juice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled it works well but VERY difficult to clean and take apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Juicer! Very happy. It extras more juice than my old one. Clean up is fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Vais

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful juicer! I love it! It arrived exactly on the day they said it would and I'm so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pinklady

customer_reviews.title: You will love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: Best juicer on the market. The family uses it every day. Very quite and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: archgreen

customer_reviews.title: Dont recomend Way under powered. Very small throat
customer_reviews.text: No power juicer stops a lot! This juicer does a good job whem its turning or running. THIS IS WAY UNDERPOWERED! This thing stops all the time! YOU HAVE TO CUT EVERYTHING UP INTO VERY SMALL SIZE! For example an apple has to be cut into smaller than 1/4 size. It cleans okay. Be ready to use the reverse a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Berkuit

customer_reviews.title: Omega Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Celery juice—I’ve been through several juicers and this one works the best for celery!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is also very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: After all the research I did on slow juicers, this proved to be the right choice. Reviews were very helpful and accurate. Juicer does well with leafy greens and hard fruits / vegetables (carrots in smaller pieces). It is also very easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo 20

customer_reviews.title: Big difference over high speed juicer! No ear plugs ...
customer_reviews.text: Big difference over high speed juicer! No ear plugs needed, I can make juice in the morning without disturbing everyone else! Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Marigny

customer_reviews.title: Totally in love with my juicer
customer_reviews.text: Totally in love with my juicer. My husband is constantly complaining about the extra time I am spending in the kitchen juicing!
customer_reviews.author: Kimisha James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. Everything I expected. Great juice, easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: We have been using it every day for about three weeks and it's great.
customer_reviews.text: way faster then our old Omega 8005, and it's a lot easier to clean. We have been using it every day for about three weeks and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: oscar j.  lemus-lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This juicer has changed my life. I crave juices regularly. One step closer to a new vegan lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Juicer so i have nothing to compare it to but im loving it.
customer_reviews.author: lufeful

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes great, low pulp juice. Simple to clean. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Works Exactly as advertised. We use it every day. Easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Spotweld

customer_reviews.title: Juicer works great!! Advice
customer_reviews.text: Juicer works great!! Advice: make sure to cut celery and leafy greens to small pieces before juicing.... Easier on engine and makes for greater yields...
customer_reviews.author: SamIAm07

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer. Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I chose this juicer - and I did look at lots of them. The set-up, use, and clean up is as simple as it gets. I take mine apart right after juicing, rinse with hot water, and leave to air dry on the counter. Takes me less than 5 minutes. I highly recommend this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: V. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, quick to clean, quiet, low pulp, solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Bulty

customer_reviews.title: ... as much as I thought but it does a good job! I'm satisfied for it being my first ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't yield quite as much as I thought but it does a good job! I'm satisfied for it being my first juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like many other here have expressed
customer_reviews.text: Like many other here have expressed, this is a great machine. I have never juiced and after watching ‘Fat, Sick, and nearly Dead’ we decided to give this a try. The juicing is very easy to do and cutting the veggies takes very little time and insures the unit won’t stop\jam. I was really worried about the cleanup taking too much time and discouraging us from using it but it is so easy and fast. I would recommend this unit over and over.
customer_reviews.author: John Paul Keesy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this juicer, I get very little waste and lots of good juice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Estes

customer_reviews.title: 40 minutes of cleaning the machine after each cup of juice
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning the pulp out of this machine, an action that must occur after each use, means disassembling the entire machine, and its 20 or so parts, and even then the pulp does not come out easily. We had to poke at it in tight spaces with toothpicks. For, say, one cup of juice, easily purchased at a health food store, allow about 40 minutes of clean-up. What a failure of design!
customer_reviews.author: hiram

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect size for under the counter and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect size for under the counter and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Can put larger slices of fruit / veggies and not bad on the clean up. Good amount of juice with dry pulp
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is wonderful! I'm having a great time using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L Elam

product_meta.title: Omega VSJ843QS Vertical Slow Masticating Juicer Makes Continuous Fresh Fruit and Vegetable Juice at 43 Revolutions per Minute Features Compact Design Automatic Pulp Ejection, 150-Watt, Silver
product_meta.description: The Auto-Cleaning system keeps the screen clear, increasing the machines efficiency. After you are finished juicing, The Auto-Cleaning system minimizes the clean-up process. The vertical design is compact, contemporary and productive. With the Omega VSJ843QS, form and function combine to give you the highest degree of extraction and the healthiest possible juice. The VSJ843QS, juicer is the newest, lowest speed vertical masticating juicer in Omega offering. As a natural immune booster, Omega Cold Press Juicers deliver a potent dose of antioxidants to boost and support overall health and immunity. Cold press juicing is one of the most effective ways to easily access nutritious enzymes that help to improve immunity and overall health. Don’t eat your fruits and veggies—juice them! Get a day’s worth of vitamins in one delicious juice!
feature_bullets: INDUSTRY LEADING 15-YEAR Coverage on parts and performance
HIGH YIELD: Dual-edge auger with tighter fit tolerance strains more juice and breaks down fiber to a palatable level for a smoother, nutrient dense juice.
BOOST YOUR IMMUNITY - Cold press juicing is one of the most effective ways to easily access nutritious enzymes and antioxidants that boost immunity and enhance overall health.

FEATURES - The no drip juice tap at the end of the juice spout can be closed during the juicing process to create a mixing function. Simply open to the release the tap so the juice can flow into the juice cup. The juice tap can be closed when you are done juicing and ready to remove your juice cup so that no mess is left behind.
DESIGN - The vertical design is compact, contemporary, and productive. In the Omega VSJ843QS, form and function combine to give you the highest degree of extraction and the healthiest possible juice.

LONGER SHELF LIFE - Gentle squeezing action keeps healthy enzymes intact, reduces heat buildup and delays the oxidation process, increasing the juice's shelf life. Operating at a low speed of 43 revolutions per minute (RPM) creates optimal efficiency.
HEALTHY AND DELICIOUS JUICES - Squeeze juice from fruits vegetables, leafy greens, even wheatgrass or make nut milks. The automatic pulp ejection allows you to juice continuously.
EASY TO CLEAN - The Auto cleaning system keeps the screen clear, increasing the machines efficiency. After you are finished juicing, the auto cleaning system minimizes the cleanup process.
110/120 Volt model designed exclusively for use in North America. Coverage valid in North America only.
